text: @VoteBlueIn2020 @VP Mr. Pence, you're handling the coronavirus about as well as you handled the AIDS crisis in Indiana when you were "governor"! It's after Memorial Day & coronavirus is still w/ us. Stupid loser & Trump's lap dog Vice Poodle!
